data.actual_result: It takes you to the bottom most unread channel.
data.expected_result: It takes you to the nearest unread channel.
data.short_description: Clicking on the "New Unreads" bar takes you to the place where bottom most unread channel is located rather than the nearest one.
data.steps_to_repro: - Mark all the top channels of a server (with many channels) as read. - - Click on the unreads bar (make sure you have many unread channels out of sight). - Observe.
